metadata.title: CVE-2014-3242 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SOAPpy 0.12.5 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a SOAPrequest containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with anentity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-soappy - 0.12.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-soappy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.22-1').
